# Webhook Integrations

Webhook system for key events: instance started/stopped, snapshot completed, failover triggered, cost threshold reached. Enables integration with external automation.

## Rationale
Requested in known gaps. Enables automation for power users. Integration with Zapier/n8n expands use cases. Critical for teams with existing DevOps tooling.

## User Stories
- As a DevOps engineer, I want webhooks so that I can trigger Slack notifications when my training job finishes
- As a developer, I want webhooks so that I can integrate Dumont events with my CI/CD pipeline

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Configurable webhooks per event type
- [ ] Events: instance.started, instance.stopped, snapshot.completed, failover.triggered, cost.threshold
- [ ] Webhook testing with sample payload
- [ ] Retry logic for failed deliveries (3 attempts)
- [ ] Webhook logs viewable in dashboard
